name: Katana Clicker - Ludum Dare 44
description:
Katana Clicker is a clicker game made during a 48h game jam under the theme "Your life as a currency" ! You're a fighter in a Neo Tokyo-inspired city and your goal is to click as much as possible to destroy monsters. However, you will have to sacrifice your health points in order to buy bonuses, what will you choose ?

Team :

Mari : Chara Designer Monsters
